file_content.text: You should not be here. The dark power in this place will shatter your mind into a thousand pieces.
He doesn't--what? Who is this? Spies? Thieves come for my research? Wait, you look familiar....
Yes... I remember now. Why have you returned?
I remember. Yes. The Sith Lord? A very strong specimen... what do you want?
Yes... the Sith Lord. What brings you back?
Ah, yes. The bounty hunter. Why are you here?
Ah, yes. I remember you now. The sneaky one. What do you want?
Yes, I remember you now. What is it you want?
Something in the Dark Heart gave a Gormak visions.
I'm looking for something.
Visions? Do I look like I know where to find visions? Yes, well, fortunate for you, I do.
Where can I find the source of the power in the Dark Heart?
Directions.
"Where can it find the source?" Ha! Yes, I know the answer.
I missed something in there.
Trying to usurp my findings, are you? I sense Serevin's hand in this....
Serevin sends you there, does he? Yes, I'm sure he did. Very well.
You are an unusual specimen. I don't know what will result from this.
The deepest secrets of the Dark Heart lie through the Grim Warrens. Whatever you seek, it is likely there.
What do you want? Go bother Serevin! I have no patience for interruptions!
I'm done. The vorantikus was no challenge.
Who are you? What do you--oh. Yes. I sent you to the Nightmare Lands. Back already?
I'm done. I cleansed the shard at the shrines.
You did? This throws all my calculations into disarray....
Very well, let me see the shard now.
Good. Good. Entirely purged. I will record this test as successful.
Am I sufficiently protected against the insanity?
Can I enter the Dark Heart?
You are as protected as I can make you. Whether that is sufficient remains to be seen.
You didn't know this would work?
This was a test?
Nothing is gained without risk!
Good. I'll leave now.
So... you will venture into the Dark Heart?
You should see Darth Serevin first. I'm sure he'll throw a tantrum if he's left out of the loop.
Serevin thinks he's so clever, pretending to be interested in the secrets of the Dark Heart.
He doesn't appreciate the genius of my work--how intricate the dark powers are.
I do the important work on Voss! Who in the Emperor's name are you?
I'm here on Imperial business. I need to enter the Dark Heart.
I'm a Sith Lord.
Sith! They think they know power. But you cannot understand what true power is until you've been to the Dark Heart.
I've been hired to go into the Dark Heart.
I'm a bounty hunter.
To study the effects of the Dark Heart on such a healthy specimen... very interesting.
I'm an Imperial Agent, sent to ask for your expertise on entering the Dark Heart, my lord.
I wouldn't put it that way.
My expertise? Yes, very good. No one knows more about the Dark Heart than I do.
Darth Serevin sent me to see you.
I'm here on business.
Yes, I suppose he wouldn't risk his precious skin by coming here himself.
Are you always this paranoid?
It takes hours of meditation every day for me to keep my mind intact!
I need to go in there and come out sane.
I can't risk that.
What for? Are you trying to take over my research?
Clearly, you could put those hours to better use.
It's not working.
Tell me about this place.
That tomb is the source. If I can explore its depths, all will be revealed.
I will harness the power here, and with it I will bring the galaxy to its knees for the Emperor!
Then I shall--who are you? What do you want?
Tell me how to endure the power here.
Protection from the madness.
You were telling me about the tomb in the Dark Heart.
Stay focused, would you?
So much for your meditation.
I... wait... I remember now. Yes. You can serve my research. I'll send you into the Dark Heart. Yes....
I pulled this shard from the belly of the Dark Heart. Madness calls to it... there are two ways to defend your mind.
Carry it with you while you carve a path of destruction through the denizens of the Nightmare Lands.
I won't go on a fool's errand.
That can't possibly work.
No, no! That's not the plan! That's just the first step!
This shard will stop the dark power from consuming my mind?
And that will protect me?
No, of course not.
And then what?
The hatred and agony of your victims will charge the shard. Then you must channel the shard's power into a vorantikus.
The vorantikus will become an embodiment of madness. Killing it will grant you mastery over that aspect of the dark power.
What's the second method?
You said I had two options.
Killing a vorantikus will somehow protect me from the dark power?
You're sure that will work?
Let's have the details, then.
If you're concerned, there is an alternative.
There are shrines in the Nightmare Lands, Jedi in origin. There, you could draw out and destroy the madness within the shard.
Not as elegant a solution, but it should work. So, will you slaughter beasts, or seek the shrines?
Slaughter it is, then.
Very good! Yes, you will make an excellent specimen for my research.
I'll take my chances with the Jedi ruins.
I'll try the shrines.
Hmph. Passable. You should still yield some data, I suppose.
Return to me when you're finished. I will make sure the protective ritual is complete.
Always trying to steal my secrets, all of them....
I won't do anything so ridiculous.
This is stupid. [Refuse quest]
Suit yourself. You'll never be able to enter the Dark Heart without my help.
